title: Weather Pain
summaries: The Weather Pain is a pre-Hardmode magic weapon which casts a Hurtnado upon use, a small tornado projectile that vanishes after 9.5 seconds. The Hurtnado homes in on nearby enemies and stays latched onto them for a few seconds, dealing consistent damage. It bounces off blocks, pierces enemies up to 14 times and has 10 armor penetration.
The Weather Pain is dropped by Deerclops with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance.
